gov.ca.water.calgui.presentation

Interface Report.Writer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReportPDFWriter
    Enclosing class:
    Report

    public static interface Report.Writer
    Externalizes the format for output. This allows the flexibility of defining a writer to output the report to a PDF file vs an HTML file.
    Author:
    psandhu
